ygData.subject: Re: Star Rubies
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw one for sale for the first time last night in Shinee Things , the troll run shop in the Foreign Quarter zone of Neriak. I had never seen them there
ygData.messageBody:
I saw one for sale for the first time last night in "Shinee Things", the troll run shop in the
Foreign Quarter zone of Neriak. I had never seen them there before but it was in a normal sale slot
so I assume it's a new item. With my charisma (60) it was about 85 plat. I also saw a flame emerald
or something like that. Another stone I had not seen before.

-Haytred, Erollisi Marr


"Diina, David" wrote:

> From: "Diina, David" <DDiina@...>
>
> Can anyone tell me where to buy STAR RUBIES or if they are not merchant
> items what mob drops them??? Thanx a lot
>
